item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 B&Q Logo
B&Q Limited is a British multinational DIY and home improvement retailing company, headquartered in Eastleigh, United Kingdom, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Kingfisher plc. Founded by Richard Block and David Quayle in 1969 originally as Block & Quayle, the retail chain offers over 40,000 products across 300 physical stores and online shops. Since 2015, B&Q has been closing a number of stores, in favour of converting some to outlets of Screwfix.
You can download theBQlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: BQ
item.description: B&Q Limited is a British multinational DIY and home improvement retailing company, headquartered in Eastleigh, United Kingdom, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Kingfisher plc. Founded by Richard Block and David Quayle in 1969 originally as Block & Quayle, the retail chain offers over 40,000 products across 300 physical stores and online shops. Since 2015, B&Q has been closing a number of stores, in favour of converting some to outlets of Screwfix.
